title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 624.1 - Refusal to accept training
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 624.1 - Refusal to accept training

State Regulations
A trainee who has refused without good cause to accept
training pursuant to the provisions of article 23-A of the Labor Law, the

Federal Manpower Development and Training Act, or any other Federal Act shall
not receive a State training, subsistence or transportation allowance for one
year thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
624.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
